title: Tlingit Basics - Greetings
text: Learn basic Tlingit greetings and introductions. Gunalchéesh (thank you), Wáa sá iyatee? (How are you?), Aadé (hello/goodbye).

title: Tlingit Family Words
text: Learn family terms in Tlingit. Aaná (mother), Táa (father), sháan (grandmother), yáay (grandfather), k'eitl' (child).

title: Tlingit Nature Words
text: Learn about nature in Tlingit. Héen (water), s'íx' (tree), ch'áak' (eagle), x'aan (salmon), k'wát' (bear).

title: Tlingit Cultural Terms
text: Learn important cultural concepts. K'usteeyí (potlatch), at.óow (treasure), shuká (clan), k'wáan (people/tribe).

title: Tlingit Advanced Phrases
text: Master complex Tlingit phrases and cultural expressions for storytelling and ceremonial contexts.

title: Haida Basics - Greetings
text: Learn basic Haida greetings. Háw'aa (hello), Gíidang (thank you), K'yuu (goodbye), Hl gudang (good morning).

title: Haida Family Words
text: Learn family terms in Haida. K'íing (mother), K'úug (father), k'íinaang (grandmother), k'úugang (grandfather).

title: Haida Nature Words
text: Learn about nature in Haida. Gándlaay (water), k'áats' (tree), tl'áak' (eagle), gíid (salmon).

title: Haida Cultural Terms
text: Learn important Haida cultural concepts and traditions related to potlatch and clan systems.

title: Haida Advanced Phrases
text: Master complex Haida expressions and storytelling language used in traditional narratives.

title: Tsimshian Basics - Greetings
text: Learn basic Tsimshian greetings and polite expressions. Yagwéi (hello), Gyik'yüü (thank you).

title: Tsimshian Family Words
text: Learn family relationships in the Tsimshian language including extended family terms.

title: Tsimshian Nature Words
text: Learn about the natural world in Tsimshian including animals, plants, and landscape features.

title: Tsimshian Cultural Terms
text: Learn important Tsimshian cultural concepts and ceremonies including potlatch traditions.

title: Tsimshian Advanced Phrases
text: Master advanced Tsimshian language and cultural expressions for formal and ceremonial contexts.
